description:
Bonnie Bramlett - 2006 - I Can Laugh About It Now

Her joyous spirit fills Steven StillsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Love The One YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re With, Chuck BerryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s No Particular Place to Go and Joe ZawinulÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Mercy, Mercy, Mercy. Bonnie interprets classics like A Change Is Gonna Come and Work Song with a gritty depth that only comes from a life fully lived, scars worn as badges as of honour. But the true soul of I CAN LAUGH ABOUT IT NOW is in BonnieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s original songs and selected covers, which reflect her soul-drenched heart.
